Roadmap

Features

On this page

Roadmap ​

Current Status: v0.5 ​

Complete architectural rewrite from v0.4:

v0.4 (Prototype)

  • Provider + Command pattern
  • Direct database access from UI
  • No multi-user support
  • Limited error handling

v0.5 (Better Approach)

  • Feature-first organization
  • Cubit pattern with reactive streams
  • Type-safe (Freezed + Drift)
  • Offline-first with background sync
  • Multi-user ready

Explore features →

Development Approach ​

User-driven development. Features prioritized from waitlist feedback and real usage.

Join waitlist to influence priorities.

Potential Future Development ​

Under consideration based on feedback:

  • Search enhancements
  • Reports and exports
  • Backend API and cloud sync
  • OAuth authentication
  • Recurring transactions
  • Budget templates
  • Advanced filtering
  • Budget alerts
  • Historical analysis
  • Personalized BAR
  • Shared budgets
  • Multi-currency

Development Status ​

Completed

  • MVVM architecture
  • Repository pattern
  • userId filtering
  • Drift database
  • BAR calculation
  • Transaction tracking
  • Budget management
  • Category CRUD
  • Dashboard with charts
  • Material 3 theme
  • Offline-first
  • Navigation with gestures
  • Date filtering
  • Inline editing
  • Form validation
  • Logging system

Active

  • Backend API
  • Documentation
  • Testing
  • Performance

Under Consideration

  • Search history
  • Enhanced navigation
  • Recurring transactions
  • Budget templates
  • OAuth
  • Cloud sync
  • Reports
  • Alerts
  • Insights
